resources.string: This is a number guessing game, in which a random number between 0 and 100 is generated. As a participant, you will be given 5 chances to correctly identify this number. Throughout the game, you will receive hints that will help you get closer to the target number, indicating whether the number you have guessed is greater or less than the randomly generated number. Your ability to interpret these clues and adjust your guesses will be key to your success in this challenge. Good luck!
